content: In 2020, which American singer-songwriter won Album of the Year at the Grammy Awards for her work on "folklore" while continuing her reign as a pop icon?

I believe the American singer-songwriter you're referring to is Taylor Swift. In 2021, she won the Album of the Year at the Grammy Awards for her album "folklore," which was released in 2020. This victory marked a significant moment in her career, as it was her first Grammy for Album of the Year and showcased her versatility as an artist moving beyond her earlier country music roots into a more indie folk and alternative sound.
